name: Skin Of Lies
description:
"The world is infested with abnormalities"

Huntsmen deal with the supernatural so that normal people don't have to.  One such huntsman, Donavan, has vanished. What mysteries await his family who have gone looking for him? 

What happens when an expert meets something new? Such as a

Skinwalker...

*This game is a demo

Skin Of Lies is a free horror game, where your decisions can affect the game. If the demo gets attention, I'll release a full length game with multiple endings. - Highjinks

{FEATURES}
  • 10K Words
  • 5 Gritty characters
  • Contains violence, blood & strong language
  • A Skinwalker 
{CREDITS}

Highjinks The HANDSOME game designer/writer

Soso Groves Character designer

Otselot Background designer

*Sound effects from Zapsplat

This is the 1st game I have ever made, I accept criticism with open arms.
